title: Epic Games may head to court again with  Bandcamp over Android billing policy, Google responds [U]
content:
Just last month, Epic Games announced that it would acquire the music platform Bandcamp. Now, Bandcamp is the latest reason Epic Games is taking legal action against Google, this time over the tech giant’s Android app billing crackdown.

description: As Google has cracked down on Play Store billing for Android apps, Epic has filed with court regarding the potential removal of Bandcamp.
